items.sentence: Tom told me that he planned to wait until Monday to go.
Tom told me that he had studied French for three years.
Tom told me that he doesn't want to spend time in jail.
Tom told me that he didn't study French in high school.
Tom told me that he didn't really want to go to Boston.
Tom told me that he didn't have any plans for tomorrow.
Tom told me that he didn't get enough sleep last night.
Tom told me that he asked Mary to the homecoming dance.
Tom told me he was going to the hospital to visit Mary.
I'm afraid that Tom and Mary won't get along very well.
The problem was that Tom wanted everything for himself.
Tom opened the book to a random page and began reading.
Tom left home as soon as he graduated from high school.
Tom learned French from an old man in his neighborhood.
Tom was gone by the time we got there, but Mary wasn't.
It started raining just as Tom and I were leaving home.
That's why Tom and I were absent from school yesterday.
Tom decided to ignore what Mary said and remain silent.
Tom didn't seem to be as inspired as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn't seem to be as talented as Mary seemed to be.
